unnormalised: Fuel prices hitting the roof again, leaving your wallet drier than a Kerala summer? Looks like fuel efficiency is back on top of everyone's mind!
normalised: Fuel prices hitting the roof again, leaving your wallet drier than a Kerala summer? Looks like fuel efficiency is back on top of everyone's mind!

unnormalised: Carmakers are scrambling to offer more mileage-friendly options. Maruti is boasting about their new CNG models, claiming upwards of 30 km/kg. Even Tata is getting in the game with improved engine tech on their Altroz.
normalised: Carmakers are scrambling to offer more mileage-friendly options. Maruti is boasting about their new C N G models, claiming upwards of thirty kilometer per kilogram. Even Tata is getting in the game with improved engine tech on their Altroz.

unnormalised: But let's be real, driving style matters too! No point buying a fuel-efficient car if you're flooring it at every signal like you're racing in a Bollywood movie. Drive smoothly, folks!
normalised: But let's be real, driving style matters too! No point buying a fuel-efficient car if you're flooring it at every signal like you're racing in a Bollywood movie. Drive smoothly, folks!

unnormalised: Experts suggest regular servicing at places like Moti Nagar Auto Workshop can also boost your car's efficiency.
normalised: Experts suggest regular servicing at places like Moti Nagar Auto Workshop can also boost your car's efficiency.

unnormalised: Thinking of upgrading? Keep an eye out for hybrid and electric options. They might cost more upfront, but you'll be saving a fortune on petrol, enough to treat yourself to a massive plate of Hyderabadi biryani this Bakrid!
normalised: Thinking of upgrading? Keep an eye out for hybrid and electric options. They might cost more upfront, but you'll be saving a fortune on petrol, enough to treat yourself to a massive plate of Hyderabadi biryani this Bakrid!

unnormalised: Ultimately, whether you’re driving to catch an Onam Sadhya or just commuting to work, squeezing every last km out of that liter of petrol is crucial. Happy driving, and drive smart!
normalised: Ultimately, whether you’re driving to catch an Onam Sadhya or just commuting to work, squeezing every last kilometer out of that liter of petrol is crucial. Happy driving, and drive smart!
